Uses of Class
org.attoparser.AbstractChainedMarkupHandler

  • Packages that use AbstractChainedMarkupHandler 
    Package Description
    org.attoparser.minimize
    Handlers for minimizing (compacting) HTML markup.
    org.attoparser.select
    Handlers for filtering a part or several parts of markup during parsing in a fast and efficient way.

    • Uses of AbstractChainedMarkupHandler in org.attoparser.minimize

      Subclasses of AbstractChainedMarkupHandler in org.attoparser.minimize 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MinimizeHtmlMarkupHandler
      Implementation of IMarkupHandler used for minimizing (compacting) HTML markup.

    • Uses of AbstractChainedMarkupHandler in org.attoparser.select

      Subclasses of AbstractChainedMarkupHandler in org.attoparser.select 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AttributeSelectionMarkingMarkupHandler
      Implementation of the IMarkupHandler that adds an attribute (with a user-specified name) to all elements that match one or more selectors, as determined by a BlockSelectorMarkupHandler or NodeSelectorMarkupHandler handler.
